ch0055_00_gampi/0101_0701_01_10:
Well met, young [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been awaiting your arrival!
ch0055_00_gampi/0101_0701_02_10:
I shall be your shield today!
Do not tarry, now! Let us be off!
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_01_10:
The manner in which you battle with your
Pokémon is just and fair...
and, might I add, quite brilliant!
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_02_10:
There is an etiquette to Pokémon battling,
young [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="sir" F="lady" ], and I firmly believe that
etiquette includes fighting with honor.
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_03_10:
We Trainers should take pride in defeat
as much as we do in triumph—
doing so leaves little room for regret.
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_04_10:
I approach each and every Pokémon battle
I compete in with the same earnestness.
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0702_01_10:
Pokémon are the greatest of comrades—
they never fail to give us their utmost effort.
ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0702_02_10:
That is why I believe that we, as Trainers,
have an obligation to give them our sincere
effort in return lest we dishonor our Pokémon!
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_01_10:
Aegislash has been my comrade in
countless battles.
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_02_10:
In fact, I would go so far as to say that
Aegislash is my pride and joy!
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_03_10:
I hope that you, too, feel a sense of pride
when you look at your own Pokémon.
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_04_10:
To have pride in one’s Pokémon means to trust 
and believe in them! Thus strength is born!
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0702_01_10:
If you have pride in your Pokémon—
truly feel it in your heart—your Pokémon
will surely respond in kind.
ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0702_02_10:
I feel it in mine own heart and have
made a vow to fight every fight with
honor and good faith.
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m away from home,
my Klefki keeps the keys to my
estate safe and sound.
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_02_10:
At first, the little prankster made off with
my keys, hid them where I couldn’t
find them...
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_03_10:
But when I defeated him in a Pokémon
battle, he returned the keys to me
without so much as a question.
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_04_10:
It was then that I decided to entrust Klefki
with my keys of my own accord...
We have been jolly friends ever since.
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_01_10:
No thief can steal my keys as long as
Klefki is keeping them safe.
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_02_10:
In fact, I would go so far as to say that
my being able to walk about with
such confidence here on Pasio...
ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_03_10:
despite being so far away from my estate...is all
thanks to Klefki.
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_01_10:
Maintaining the glorious condition of my
steel armor requires intensive training.
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_02_10:
Some days, I plunge my steel gloves
into an open flame. On others, I seat
myself beneath a raging waterfall.
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_03_10:
Sometimes I don my armor and have
my Aegislash attack me head-on!
It’s true—on my honor as a knight!
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_04_10:
I would not dare provoke an attack from
Aegislash without my steel armor on, however!
And do not try such at home, young [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="sir" F="lady" ]!
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_01_10:
My Aegislash’s attacks are
extraordinarily sharp.
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_02_10:
SO sharp and intense that I can feel
the force of his attacks through my
magnificent armor!
ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_03_10:
And it only intensifies during a battle...
I long to feel the same brute force that
the Pokémon feel on the front lines.
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_01_10:
The desire to protect not only oneself but
also the people and Pokémon around you...
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_02_10:
That desire can be a Trainer’s sword—
and also his shield!
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_03_10:
Young [Name:PlayerNickname ], it seems you
already possess your own such sword and shield.
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_04_10:
Take up your weapons, and fight to defend
your comrades! Lead them to victory!
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_01_10:
A team will never experience true triumph
if its strength is limited to one member!
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_02_10:
But you, young [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="sir" F="lady" ], possess the skill to
rescue your teammates from crisis—
to reinforce their sense of unity!
ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_03_10:
A sword and shield can be quite useful,
but only one who is both stout of heart and
filled with pride shall rightfully wield them.
ch0055_00_gampi/1701_0701_01_10:
Do accept this token of my regard!
I believe it may be of use to you!
ch0055_00_gampi/1701_0702_01_10:
I knew it from the moment I laid eyes
upon it... Knew that this item was
destined to find your hand.
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_01_10:
Long has this suit of armor—this treasure—
been held by the esteemed knights of my family.
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_02_10:
Generation after generation, we have
protected the land of Kalos, living in
peace with the Pokémon that dwell there.
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_03_10:
Long, long ago, the land of Kalos was
swept up in a ruthless war, you see...
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_04_10:
My ancestors banded together with Pokémon
to rescue the townspeople from a cruel fate...
So ’twas written in the annals of history.
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_01_10:
Those Pokémon and my ancestors were
defending the future, child. It is thanks to
them that we are able to live in peace now.
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_02_10:
We must not take that for granted.
That is why I, Wikstrom, strive to live
in harmony with Pokémon...
ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_03_10:
I shall keep the memory of my family’s
good deeds in my heart and dutifully
pass it on to the next generation.
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_01_10:
I have given my word that any contest of mine
shall be fought fairly and honorably.
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_02_10:
And you, my friend, have demonstrated
the very definition of true honor in battle
many times over!
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_03_10:
Thy heart is pure and sincere,
as evidenced by your interactions
with Pokémon and other Trainers.
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_04_10:
Verily, you fill my heart with pride, child.
Nay. Rather, ’tis the team we form together
that has that honor!
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_01_10:
The road is long and hard, young one, 
but with a bit of good faith and perseverance,
you will reach your destination in time.
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_02_10:
Do not waver now! You must proceed
with confidence!
ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_03_10:
After all, I will be right here to protect you!
My sword is ever at the ready.
You have only to ask!
ch0055_00_gampi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I give my word that
I shall not falter this day!
ch0055_00_gampi/3002_0701_01_10:
It is good to see you laboring so hard in the
early morn. Let us train together!
ch0055_00_gampi/3003_0701_01_10:
Greetings! Let us strive for greatness—
that we might have no regrets!
ch0055_00_gampi/3004_0701_01_10:
Let us press forward honorably,
with the sun at our backs!
ch0055_00_gampi/3005_0701_01_10:
You are training hard—and it is well past dusk.
Remember, rest is of equal import.
ch0055_00_gampi/3006_0701_01_10:
Only a little more to go!
Let us press on with pride in our hearts!
